delete.TITLE: Ignore Suggested Template Changes
delete.BODY: This will ignore the suggested template change(s), keeping your customizations. This means you will not get the features from these changes. This operation cannot be undone.

overwrite.TITLE: Overwrite Using Suggested Template Changes
overwrite.BODY: This will overwrite any customizations you've made to the following files. This operation cannot be undone. You may want to make a backup in case important changes are lost.
